name: Aero Ace
description:
You play as Captain Jared Sharpe as he takes to the skies to fulfil his mission as a Pilot of the Aero Ace Division. 

This game was made for the Aro Jam 2023.  I wanted to not only represent the community in a fun game but I also wanted to pay homage to the Ace Combat series in the game. The game was made in Scratch engine and was originally a lot more ambitious but I'll save room  for a follow up game in the near future.

Music can be found here: The Shield | Royalty Free Music - Pixabay
